_header: Illurin the pope that holy martyr is
Subjects: Illurin (al. Silverius), saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Illurin (al. Silverius), in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Illurin þe pope þat holy marter isWas I bore in grece as
                    þe bok vs telleþ I wis…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…þe xii calendre of iulie I buried he was þonow god
                    vs bringe to þe blis þat he was I do
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 384-6.
